name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.max.objects
description:
The maximum number of files, directories and blocks
  dfs supports. A value of zero indicates no limit to the number
  of objects that dfs supports.

name: dfs.balancer.service.retries.on.exception
description:
When the balancer is executed as a long-running service, it will retry upon encountering an exception. This
    configuration determines how many times it will retry before considering the exception to be fatal and quitting.

name: dfs.client.write.exclude.nodes.cache.expiry.interval.millis
description:
The maximum period to keep a DN in the excluded nodes list
  at a client. After this period, in milliseconds, the previously excluded node(s) will
  be removed automatically from the cache and will be considered good for block allocations
  again. Useful to lower or raise in situations where you keep a file open for very long
  periods (such as a Write-Ahead-Log (WAL) file) to make the writer tolerant to cluster maintenance
  restarts. Defaults to 10 minutes.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.client.thread-count
description: The number of threads to handle client API requests

name: hadoop.security.uid.cache.secs
description:
This is the config controlling the validity of the entries in the cache
        containing the userId to userName and groupId to groupName used by
        NativeIO getFstat().

name: dfs.datanode.slowdisk.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a disk is definitely not slow.

name: dfs.provided.aliasmap.inmemory.batch-size
description: The batch size when iterating over the database backing the aliasmap

name: nfs.mountd.port
description: Specify the port number used by Hadoop mount daemon.

name: dfs.blockreport.initialDelay
description:
Delay for first block report in seconds. Support multiple time unit
    suffix(case insensitive), as described in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If
    no time unit is specified then seconds is assumed
